publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2739 Donald Gorrie: Interdepartmental Working Group on Freedom of Information—That the Parliament welcomes the decision by the Interdepartmental Working Group on Freedom of Information to hold its meetings in public and urges other Executive and Parliamentary bodies to follow this excellent example. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-2739 Donald Gorrie:Interdepartmental Working Group on Freedom of Information—That the Parliament welcomes the decision by the Interdepartmental Working Group on Freedom of Information to hold its meetings in public and urges other Executive and Parliamentary bodies to follow this excellent example.
S2M-2739 Interdepartmental Working Group on Freedom of Information (lodged on 28 April 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-2739 Interdepartmental Working Group on Freedom of Information (lodged on 28 April 2005) Ms Sandra White*
